name: house_prices_get_points_of_interest
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool zoopla_v2.
Tool description: This API helps to query for properties for rent, sale in UK to create a real estate site/application such as zoopla.com
API description: Fetches the nearest points of interest for a given property using the Zoopla API.

property_id.description: The ID of the property for which to retrieve points of interest. This is usually obtained from the `/house-prices/estimate` endpoint.
